Package hu.ponte.hr.services

Class ImageStore

java.lang.Object
hu.ponte.hr.services.ImageStore
@Service public class ImageStore extends Object
The business logic of storing images.

Author:
tattila93

-> findById() parameter: String finds the image entity with the given id in the database if there is no entity with the given id it throws an EntityNotFoundException else returns with the entity

-> findByName() parameter: String finds the image entity with the given name in the database and returns with the entity

-> findAll() parameter: - finds all the image entities in the database and converts them into a DTO (ImageMeta) list returns with the list

-> saveImage()< parameter: Multipart file sets the imageEntity instance field with the given values if it is a picture and its size is not bigger than 2MB else writes a warning message to the console return value is void

-> isPicture() parameter: Multipart file checks whether the file you want to upload is a picture or not cannot be null returns a boolean

-> isSufficientSize() parameter: Multipart file checks whether the file you want to upload is not bigger than the max limit (currently 2Mb) returns a boolean

  • Method Details

    • findById

      public ImageEntity findById(String id)
      Finds the image entity with the given id in the database. If there is no entity with the given id it throws an EntityNotFoundException. Else returns with the entity.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the ImageEntity you are looking for
      Returns:
      ImageEntity

    • findByName

      public Optional<ImageEntity> findByName(String name)
      Finds the image entity with the given name in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the ImageEntity you are looking for
      Returns:
      ImageEntity

    • findAll

      public List<ImageMeta> findAll()
      Finds all the image entities in the database and converts them into a DTO (ImageMeta) list.
      Returns:
      List

    • saveImage

      public void saveImage(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws IncorrectSignatureException, IncorrectKeyException, IncorrectAlgorithmException, IOException
      parameter: Multipart file sets the imageEntity instance field with the given values if it is a picture and its size is not bigger than 2MB else writes a warning message to the console
      Parameters:
      file - (MultipartFile)
      Throws:
      IncorrectSignatureException - check signService.signAndEncodeToBase64 description
      IncorrectKeyException - check signService.signAndEncodeToBase64 description
      IncorrectAlgorithmException - check signService.signAndEncodeToBase64 description
      IOException - if file not found

    • isPicture

      private boolean isPicture(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      isPicture() Checks whether the file, you want to upload is a picture or not.
      Parameters:
      file - (MultipartFile)
      Returns:
      boolean

    • isSufficientSize

      private boolean isSufficientSize(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Tests whether the size of the file is below the maximum limit or not. This value can be edited in application.properties
      Parameters:
      file - (MultipartFile)
      Returns:
      boolean
